entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:12 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
